# enablePFS

**Instance Property**

A Boolean indicating whether or not Perfect Forward Secrecy is enabled.

## Declaration

```swift
var enablePFS: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Accessing other IKEv2 properties

- **deadPeerDetectionRate**: The frequency at which the IKEv2 client will run the dead peer detection algorithm.
- **NEVPNIKEv2DeadPeerDetectionRate**: An enumeration of values for the frequency at which the IKEv2 client runs the dead peer detection algorithm.
- **useConfigurationAttributeInternalIPSubnet**: A Boolean indicating whether or not the IKEv2 client should use the INTERNAL_IP4_SUBNET and/or INTERNAL_IP6_SUBNET attributes sent by the IKEv2 server.
- **disableMOBIKE**: A Boolean indicating whether or not MOBIKE should be disabled for the IKEv2 sessions.
- **disableRedirect**: A Boolean indicating whether or not IKEv2 server redirects are disabled.
- **enableRevocationCheck**: Enable revocation checking of the IKEv2 server certificate.
- **strictRevocationCheck**: Require a “not revoked” result when checking if the certificate identifying the server is revoked.
- **mtu**: The Maximum Transmission Unit (MTU) size in bytes to assign to the tunnel interface.
